data.content:
noun
[singular] :a gesture in which you hold your hand out with your thumb pointed up in order to say yes, to show approval, etc.
The coach gave me a/the thumbs-up after I scored the goal. - often used figuratively
Our proposal got a/the thumbs-up. [=our proposal was approved]
The movie got a thumbs-up from most critics. [=most critics liked the movie]
